name.baseName: 铁氧体磁珠、磁芯和磁套

dataSetInformation.common:synonyms: Electromagnetic Interference (EMI) suppressors; Ferrite Clamp; Ferrite Block; EMI Filter Bead; Choke Bead; Semicircular Cable Clamp; Ferrite Ring; Noise Suppression Bead; Ferrite Choke; N/A for brands

Electromagnetic Interference (EMI) suppressors; Ferrite Clamp; Ferrite Block; EMI Filter Bead; Choke Bead; Semicircular Cable Clamp; Ferrite Ring; Noise Suppression Bead; Ferrite Choke; N/A for brands
dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Ferrite Beads, Cores and Sleeves refer to components used in electronics to suppress high-frequency noise in electronic circuits. They are made from ferrite (iron oxide mixed with metal) and are treated to achieve specific electromagnetic properties. These components comply with electronic industry standards for noise suppression and quality, are used in various applications such as power supplies and data cables, and produced using a sintering production route. They are available as part of a production mix and can be supplied to consumers or present at the manufacturing plant.
铁氧体珠、芯和套是用于电子设备中，用于抑制电子电路中的高频噪声的元件。它们由铁氧体（氧化铁与金属混合物）制成，并经过处理获得特定的电磁属性。这些组件符合电子行业对噪声抑制和质量的标准，用于多种应用，如电源和数据电缆，并采用烧结生产路线生产。它们是生产混合物的一部分，可以交付给消费者或存在于制造工厂。
